title: 2 Simple Fonts
content:
Hi,  
I'm looking for fonts similar to the ones used in this image. I'm mainly looking for the font used for the W and also the text at the top and bottom.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824190113im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_4951.JPG)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824190113/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_70.JPG) | 519.11 KB |
author: jshels

comments.content:
[United](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824190113/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection) is the only one I know combining both slab (/W) and sans serif (rest) in a single family with many variations in weight and width. BTW, the four upper terminals /W could easily be reconstructed with 2 overlapped /V.  
More alternatives: [http://typophile.com/node/107362](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824190113/http:/typophile.com/node/107362 "http://typophile.com/node/107362"), [Fancy \> Old School](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824190113/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=104) DaFont section
